sentences.en: But today the delectable seafood is no longer available in abundance.

sentences.en: For most Italians digesting baseball is as delectable as eating borscht.

sentences.en: For us , it was a delectable news.
sentences.cn: 但在我们听来，这无疑是个可喜的消息。

sentences.en: He ate every savoury morsel of a delectable stew at the dinner.

sentences.en: He didn't seem to notice the delectable Miss Campbell.
sentences.cn: 他似乎并未注意到妩媚动人的坎贝尔小姐。

sentences.en: Let yourself away by the delectable girls appearing in Pierre Woodman's latest thriller.

There is also a selection of delectable non - alcoholic cocktails.

sentences.en: Through indefatigable effort, france had gained delectable success in informatization respect.

sentences.en: You will enjoy our wide arrays of delectable dishes at a reasonable price.
sentences.cn: 精心烹饪的菜肴、理的消费,为您献上美味的菜肴.

trans.tran_cn: 令人愉快的，让人喜爱的
trans.tran_en: If you describe something, especially food or drink, as delectable, you mean that it is very pleasant
